Whether you are drawn to the timeless allure of classic table games or the modern thrill of cutting-edge slot machines, our extensive selection guarantees that each visit will be filled with enjoyment and countless opportunities to win big. Immerse yourself in our gaming choices and uncover your next favorite game! Blackjack Step into the fascinating world of Blackjack, where strategy and skill come together in an electrifying challenge. Your objective is to achieve a hand value of 21 without exceeding it! Engage in a thrilling contest against the dealer as you navigate crucial decisions to hit, stand, or double down. With a perfect balance of luck and strategy, every hand you play presents new opportunities for triumph, making each game a unique experience. Play Roulette Feel the adrenaline rush as the roulette wheel spins! Place your bets on your chosen lucky number, color, or even a range of numbers, and watch the ball dance around the wheel in anticipation. With every spin, excitement builds—will fortune smile upon you this time? The captivating atmosphere of the roulette table adds to the thrill, making it a favorite among players looking for an exhilarating gaming experience. Play Poker Enter the dynamic arena of poker, where skill, strategy, and a touch of bluffing determine the victor. Our diverse range of poker games, including popular variations like Texas Hold'em and Omaha, invites you to test your skills against players from all corners of the globe. Can you read your opponents and play the perfect hand to take home the coveted pot? With intense competition and high stakes, each poker game is a journey full of excitement and challenges. Play Baccarat Experience the timeless allure of Baccarat, a game that has captured the hearts of high rollers for generations. Set in an elegant atmosphere, you'll bet on the Player, Banker, or Tie, hoping for a winning hand as the cards are revealed. Simple yet sophisticated, Baccarat combines anticipation with strategy, making it a classic choice that consistently draws players back for more thrilling rounds. Play Slot Machines Embark on a spinning adventure with our vibrant selection of slot machines! From traditional fruit-themed slots that evoke nostalgia to innovative video slots brimming with captivating themes and storylines, each spin offers the chance to uncover exciting bonuses and massive jackpots. Get ready to pull that lever and chase your dreams as you navigate through an enchanting world of spinning reels and endless possibilities! pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - LuxStay | Protecting Your Privacy and Data Security ☰ Apartaments Amenities Casino Contact Us Privacy Policy 1. Introduction Thank you for visiting LuxStay. Your privacy is important to us, and we are committed to protecting your personal information. This privacy policy details how we collect, use, share, and secure your data while you interact with our website. 2. Information We Collect We may obtain information about you through various channels. The types of data we may collect on the Site include: Personal Data: Identifiable information such as your name, address, email, and phone number, along with demographic information like age, gender, hometown, and interests that you voluntarily provide when registering or participating in activities on the Site. Derivative Data: Information automatically gathered by our servers when you access the Site, including your IP address, browser type, operating system, access times, and the pages you view before and after visiting the Site. Financial Data: Payment-related information, including valid credit card details (e.g., number, brand, expiration date) that may be collected during purchases, orders, returns, exchanges, or inquiries about our services on the Site. 3. Disclosure of Your Information We may share the information we collect about you under certain conditions. Your data may be disclosed in the following circumstances: By Law or to Protect Rights: If we determine that disclosing your information is necessary to comply with legal requirements, investigate potential policy breaches, or protect the rights, property, and safety of others, we may share your information as permitted or required by law. Business Transfers: We may share or transfer your information during the negotiation of any merger, sale of business assets, financing, or acquisition of all or part of our business to another organization. Third-Party Service Providers: We may share your information with third parties that perform services for us or on our behalf, such as payment processing, data analysis, email delivery, hosting services, customer support, and marketing help. 4. Security of Your Information We employ administrative, technical, and physical security measures to safeguard your personal information. While we take reasonable steps to secure the data you provide, please be aware that no security method is foolproof, and no data transmission can be guaranteed against interception or misuse. 5. Contact Us If you have any questions or comments regarding this Privacy Policy, please feel free to contact us at: Email: luxstay@gmail.com Address: 7W33+XR, Gopalpur, Boxipalli, Odisha 761002, India Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions Disclaimer Address 7W33+XR, Gopalpur, Boxipalli, Odisha 761002, India Email luxstay@gmail.com Phone +91-87-4563212
